problem: 如图所示:两根竖直的电线杆AB长为6,CD长为3,AD交于BC于点E点,则E到地面的距离EF的长是()
answer: 解:∵两根电线杆AB、CD都竖直,EF垂直于地面,∴△ABD∽△EFD,△BCD∽△BEF,∴\frac{DF}{BD}=\frac{EF}{AB},\frac{BF}{BD}=\frac{EF}{CD},∴\frac{DF}{BD}+\frac{BF}{BD}=\frac{EF}{CD}+\frac{EF}{AB},即\frac{EF}{6}+\frac{EF}{3}=1,解得EF=2．故选:A．
comment: 本题考查了相似三角形的应用,主要利用了相似三角形对应边成比例的性质,利用\frac{DF}{BD}+\frac{BF}{BD}=1是解题的关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure: the length of two vertical telephone poles AB is N_0, the length of CD is N_1, AD intersects BC at point E, then the length of the distance from E to the ground EF is ()
